## Cluster: `r colorize(params$cluster_info,"red")`

```{r echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)
```


  


## MxCre vs B_MxCre  hallmark up

```{r, out.width="100%", echo=FALSE}
fname=file.path(
  params$report_plots_folder_png,
  glue("hallmark_up_genes_heatmap_vs_MxCre.vs.B_MxCre_cluster-{params$cluster}.png")
)
if(file.exists(fname)) knitr::include_graphics(fname)
```


```{r, out.width="100%", echo=FALSE}
### up genes top 10
flist = stringr::str_sort(grep(
  glue("top10-hallmarkup_bar_vs_MxCre.vs.B_MxCre_cluster-{params$cluster}_p"),
  list.files(
    params$report_plots_folder_png,
    full.names=TRUE
  ),
  value=TRUE,
  fixed=TRUE
),numeric=TRUE)
knitr::include_graphics(flist)

```
